column2: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can call a pogrom massacre the non-humans of §Y$TITLE$§.
Scoiatael leaders sometimes rise up against oppresion of non-humans.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to change the succession law in the §Y$TITLE$§! to tanistry!
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to change the succession law in the §Y$TITLE$§! to ultimogeniture!

§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can invade the §Y$TITLE$§. If successful, everything §Y$TARGET$§! controls within the §Y$TITLE$§! will be taken or vassalized, furthermore all currently occupied holdings will be seized.

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes all occupied territory.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! belonging to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can  declare war to return §Y$TITLE$§! under the rightful rule of Nilfgaard Empire. If successful §Y$TITLE$§! will be usurped.
